00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00029 #include "kvi_pointerlist.h"
00030 
00031 class KviWindow;
00032 
00033 class KVIRC_API KviKvsReport
00034 {
00035 public:
00036         enum Type { RunTimeError, RunTimeWarning, ParserError, ParserWarning };
00037 public:
00038         KviKvsReport(Type t,const QString &szContext,const QString &szMessage,const QString &szLocation,KviWindow * pWindow);
00039         ~KviKvsReport();
00040 protected:
00041         Type                  m_eType;
00042 
00043         // mandatory
00044         QString               m_szContext;      // context name (script name, usually)
00045         QString               m_szMessage;      // report message, always present
00046         QString               m_szLocation;     // line and col description (may be some thing like "at end of input")
00047 
00048         KviWindow           * m_pWindow;        // the window that the script was attacched to
00049 
00050         // optional
00051         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pCodeListing;   // code listing, if present, it is owned
00052         KviPointerList<QString> * m_pCallStack;     // call stack, if present, it is owned
00053 public:
00054         Type type() const { return m_eType; };
00055 
00056         KviWindow * window(){ return m_pWindow; };
00057         const QString & context(){ return m_szContext; };
00058         const QString & message(){ return m_szMessage; };
00059         const QString & location(){ return m_szLocation; };
00060         KviPointerList<QString> * codeListing(){ return m_pCodeListing; };
00061         KviPointerList<QString> * callStack(){ return m_pCallStack; };
00062 
00063         void setContext(const QString &szContext){ m_szContext = szContext; };
00064         void setMessage(const QString &szMessage){ m_szMessage = szMessage; };
00065         void setLocation(const QString &szLocation){ m_szLocation = szLocation; };
00066         void setCodeListing(KviPointerList<QString> * pListing){ m_pCodeListing = pListing; };
00067         void setCallStack(KviPointerList<QString> * pStack){ m_pCallStack = pStack; };
00068 
00069         static void findLineAndCol(const QChar * pBegin,const QChar * pPoint,int &iLine,int &iCol);
00070         static void findLineColAndListing(const QChar * pBegin,const QChar * pPoint,int &iLine,int &iCol,KviPointerList<QString> * pListing);
00071 
00072         static void report(KviKvsReport * r,KviWindow * pOutput);
00073 };
